TEXT.English: 吴哥窟
TEXT.Chinese: 吴哥窟
TEXT.French: Wat Preah Pisnulok

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]艺术家也可以使用牧师槽雇佣
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]艺术家也可以使用牧师槽雇佣
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Artists can also be hired using Priest slots

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Wat Preah Pisnulok[COLOR_REVERT]在所有城市增加了一个额外的人口点，并为您的所有[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]牧师[COLOR_REVERT]专家添加了额外的食物。它增加了它的城市产生一个大预言家的几率。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Wat Preah Pisnulok[COLOR_REVERT]在所有城市增加了一个额外的人口点，并为您的所有[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]牧师[COLOR_REVERT]专家添加了额外的食物。它增加了它的城市产生一个大预言家的几率。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Wat Preah Pisnulok[COLOR_REVERT] adds an additional population point in all cities and adds additional food to all of your [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Priest[COLOR_REVERT] specialists. It increases the odds of its city generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: 蓝色清真寺
TEXT.Chinese: 蓝色清真寺
TEXT.French: Blue Mosque

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]临时效果中最多1个[ICON_UNHAPPY]
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]临时效果中最多1个[ICON_UNHAPPY]
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]At most 1[ICON_UNHAPPY] from temporary effects

TEXT.English: 蓝色清真寺[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]限制了临时效果带来的不快。它也增加了这个城市产生一个大艺术家的机会。
TEXT.Chinese: 蓝色清真寺[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]限制了临时效果带来的不快。它也增加了这个城市产生一个大艺术家的机会。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Blue Mosque[COLOR_REVERT] limits the unhappiness from temporary effects. It also increases its city's chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: 婆罗浮屠
TEXT.Chinese: 婆罗浮屠
TEXT.French: Borobudur

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Borobudur[COLOR_REVERT]允许您雇佣三名[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]牧师[COLOR_REVERT]专家，并为您的所有[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]牧师[COLOR_REVERT]专家添加额外产品。它也增加了它的城市产生一个大预言家的几率。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Borobudur[COLOR_REVERT]允许您雇佣三名[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]牧师[COLOR_REVERT]专家，并为您的所有[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]牧师[COLOR_REVERT]专家添加额外产品。它也增加了它的城市产生一个大预言家的几率。
TEXT.French: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Borobudur[COLOR_REVERT] allows you to hire three [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Priest[COLOR_REVERT] specialists and adds additional production to all of your [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Priest[COLOR_REVERT] specialists. It also increases the odds of its city generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: 勃兰登堡门
TEXT.Chinese: 勃兰登堡门
TEXT.French: Brandenburg Gate

TEXT.English: 当你的一个将军在战斗中牺牲时，大将军点数的阈值将被重置
TEXT.Chinese: 当你的一个将军在战斗中牺牲时，大将军点数的阈值将被重置
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Great general threshold is reset when one of your generals dies in battle

TEXT.English: 当[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大将军[COLOR_REVERT]死亡时，[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]勃兰登堡门[COLOR_REVERT]重置[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大将军[COLOR_REVERT]阈值。这也增加了该市产生一位大政治家的几率。
TEXT.Chinese: 当[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大将军[COLOR_REVERT]死亡时，[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]勃兰登堡门[COLOR_REVERT]重置[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大将军[COLOR_REVERT]阈值。这也增加了该市产生一位大政治家的几率。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Brandenburg Gate[COLOR_REVERT] resets the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great General[COLOR_REVERT] threshold when a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great General[COLOR_REVERT] dies. It also increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Statesman[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: 温布利球场
TEXT.Chinese: 温布利球场
TEXT.French: Wembley

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]温布利[COLOR_REVERT]提供文化提升，并为您的文明提供七个[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]热门足球赛事[COLOR_REVERT]资源（提供快乐）。它增加了它的城市将产生一个[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]温布利[COLOR_REVERT]提供文化提升，并为您的文明提供七个[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]热门足球赛事[COLOR_REVERT]资源（提供快乐）。它增加了它的城市将产生一个[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.French: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Wembley[COLOR_REVERT] grants a culture boost and provides your civilization with seven [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hit Football Event[COLOR_REVERT] resources (which provide happiness). It increases the odds that its city will generate a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: 欧洲核子研究中心
TEXT.Chinese: 欧洲核子研究中心
TEXT.French: CERN Research Complex

TEXT.English: 欧洲核子研究中心的[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]研究中心[COLOR_REVERT]在每个城市创建了一个免费的[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]实验室[COLOR_REVERT]。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大科学家[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。
TEXT.Chinese: 欧洲核子研究中心的[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]研究中心[COLOR_REVERT]在每个城市创建了一个免费的[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]实验室[COLOR_REVERT]。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大科学家[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]CERN Research Complex[COLOR_REVERT] creates a free [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Laboratory[COLOR_REVERT] in every city. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Scientist[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: 库库尔坎神庙
TEXT.Chinese: 库库尔坎神庙
TEXT.French: Temple of Kukulkan

TEXT.English: 雨林上的[ICON_BULLET]+1[ICON_FOOD]
TEXT.Chinese: 雨林上的[ICON_BULLET]+1[ICON_FOOD]
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]+1 [ICON_FOOD] on Rainforest

TEXT.English: 库库坎神庙[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]为其所在城市制作的所有雨林地块增加了额外的食物。它还增加了这个城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大先知[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.Chinese: 库库坎神庙[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]为其所在城市制作的所有雨林地块增加了额外的食物。它还增加了这个城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大先知[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Temple of Kukulkan[COLOR_REVERT] adds extra food to all rainforest tiles worked by its city. It also increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: 加拿大国家电视塔
TEXT.Chinese: 加拿大国家电视塔
TEXT.French: CN Tower

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]加拿大国家电视塔[COLOR_REVERT]在每个城市创建一个免费的[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]广播塔[COLOR_REVERT]。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大工程师[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]加拿大国家电视塔[COLOR_REVERT]在每个城市创建一个免费的[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]广播塔[COLOR_REVERT]。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大工程师[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]CN Tower[COLOR_REVERT] creates a free [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Broadcast Tower[COLOR_REVERT] in every city. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: 圆顶清真寺
TEXT.Chinese: 圆顶清真寺
TEXT.French: Dome of the Rock

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]圆顶清真寺[COLOR_REVERT]提供一名免费的[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]牧师[COLOR_REVERT]专家，并将神龛黄金限制从20倍增加到40倍。它增加了城市生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大先知[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]圆顶清真寺[COLOR_REVERT]提供一名免费的[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]牧师[COLOR_REVERT]专家，并将神龛黄金限制从20倍增加到40倍。它增加了城市生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大先知[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Dome of the Rock[COLOR_REVERT] provides one free [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Priest[COLOR_REVERT] specialist and doubles the Shrine gold limit from 20 to 40. It increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]将所有神龛的收入限制提高一倍
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]将所有神龛的收入限制提高一倍
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Doubles the revenue limit of all your shrines

TEXT.English: 帝国大厦
TEXT.Chinese: 帝国大厦
TEXT.French: The Empire State Building

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]提供等同于城市人口的[ICON_GOLD]奖金
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]提供等同于城市人口的[ICON_GOLD]奖金
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Provides [ICON_GOLD] bonus equal to city's population

TEXT.English: 帝国大厦[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]提供了相当于其所在城市人口的黄金奖励。它还增加了城市生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大工程师[COLOR_REVERT]的几率
TEXT.Chinese: 帝国大厦[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]提供了相当于其所在城市人口的黄金奖励。它还增加了城市生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大工程师[COLOR_REVERT]的几率
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Empire State Building[COLOR_REVERT] provides a gold bonus equal to the population of the city in which it's built. It also increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]黄金时代最多消耗三个伟人
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]黄金时代最多消耗三个伟人
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Golden Ages consume at most three Great People

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]埃菲尔铁塔[COLOR_REVERT]可使所有城市免费获得[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]广播塔[COLOR_REVERT]。并使城市更有可能产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大商业家[COLOR_REVERT]。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]埃菲尔铁塔[COLOR_REVERT]可使所有城市免费获得[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]广播塔[COLOR_REVERT]。并使城市更有可能产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大商业家[COLOR_REVERT]。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Eiffel Tower[COLOR_REVERT] grants a culture boost and also limits the amount of great people consumed in a golden age to 3. Its city has an improved chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]青铜巨像[COLOR_REVERT]可使本国海滨城市的水域额外增加一个单位的商业产出。并可提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大商业家[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]青铜巨像[COLOR_REVERT]可使本国海滨城市的水域额外增加一个单位的商业产出。并可提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大商业家[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Colossus[COLOR_REVERT] adds extra commerce to all water tiles in its city. It also increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Merchant[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: 古罗马大竞技场
TEXT.Chinese: 古罗马大竞技场
TEXT.French: Flavian Amphitheatre

TEXT.English: 古罗马大竞技场[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]在建造军事单位时增加了城市的产量，并为在该城市建造的单位提供了经验值。它还增加了城市生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大工程师[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。
TEXT.Chinese: 古罗马大竞技场[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]在建造军事单位时增加了城市的产量，并为在该城市建造的单位提供了经验值。它还增加了城市生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大工程师[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Flavian Amphitheatre[COLOR_REVERT] increases its city's production when creating military units and grants experience points to units built in this city. It also increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: 迦太基巨港
TEXT.Chinese: 迦太基巨港
TEXT.French: The Great Cothon

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]迦太基巨港[COLOR_REVERT]增加了奖金生产的每一个海洋地块工作的城市。它增加了城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大商人[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]迦太基巨港[COLOR_REVERT]增加了奖金生产的每一个海洋地块工作的城市。它增加了城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大商人[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Great Cothon[COLOR_REVERT] add a bonus production to every water tile worked by its city. It increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Merchant[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]大图书馆[COLOR_REVERT]可使所在城市免费供养两位科学家，提升城市的科研能力。并能大大提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大科学家[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]大图书馆[COLOR_REVERT]可使所在城市免费供养两位科学家，提升城市的科研能力。并能大大提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大科学家[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Great Library[COLOR_REVERT] gives its city two free [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Scientist[COLOR_REVERT] specialists. It increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Scientist[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]大灯塔[COLOR_REVERT]可使所有海滨城市额外增加两条商路。[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]大灯塔[COLOR_REVERT]还可提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大商业家[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]大灯塔[COLOR_REVERT]可使所有海滨城市额外增加两条商路。[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]大灯塔[COLOR_REVERT]还可提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大商业家[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Great Lighthouse[COLOR_REVERT] creates a free [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Lighthouse[COLOR_REVERT] in every coastal city and provides two free trade routes in its city. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Merchant[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]降低敌人在墙内的移动速度[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]野蛮单位在墙内受到伤害
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]降低敌人在墙内的移动速度[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]野蛮单位在墙内受到伤害
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Reduced enemy movement speed within the walls[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Barbarian units take damage within the walls

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]长城[COLOR_REVERT]的作用范围覆盖文明的整个文化疆界，即包括地图上位于长城以外的国土。长城可使[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]蛮族[COLOR_REVERT]无法进入文明的领地，还能使在文明领地内进行的战斗带来更多的[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]大军事家[COLOR_REVERT]点数。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]长城[COLOR_REVERT]的作用范围覆盖文明的整个文化疆界，即包括地图上位于长城以外的国土。长城可使[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]蛮族[COLOR_REVERT]无法进入文明的领地，还能使在文明领地内进行的战斗带来更多的[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]大军事家[COLOR_REVERT]点数。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Great Wall[COLOR_REVERT] reduces enemy speed within your borders and also damages barbarians within your borders. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: 哈曼迪尔寺
TEXT.Chinese: 哈曼迪尔寺
TEXT.French: Harmandir Sahib

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]所有在有国教城市建设的单位获得+2经验
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]所有在有国教城市建设的单位获得+2经验
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]All units built in cities with state religion receive +2 experience

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]哈曼迪尔萨希布[COLOR_REVERT]为你所在的国家宗教城市的军队提供经验值。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大先知[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]哈曼迪尔萨希布[COLOR_REVERT]为你所在的国家宗教城市的军队提供经验值。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大先知[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Harmandir Sahib[COLOR_REVERT] grants experience points to troops built in all cities with your state religion. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]好莱坞[COLOR_REVERT]可为你的文明提供[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]卖座电影[COLOR_REVERT]资源（增加快乐度）。并使城市更有可能产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]好莱坞[COLOR_REVERT]可为你的文明提供[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]卖座电影[COLOR_REVERT]资源（增加快乐度）。并使城市更有可能产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]。
TEXT.French: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hollywood[COLOR_REVERT] grants a culture boost and provides your civilization with seven [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hit Movies[COLOR_REVERT] resources (which provide happiness). It increases the odds that its city will generate a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: 姬路城
TEXT.Chinese: 姬路城
TEXT.French: Himeji Castle

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]城市防御的增加能够增加城市的文化输出。[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+1[ICON_CULTURE] 每1个在城市的防御单位
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]城市防御的增加能够增加城市的文化输出。[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+1[ICON_CULTURE] 每1个在城市的防御单位
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]City defense increases culture output in all cities[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+1[ICON_CULTURE] per level of every fully fortified unit in the city

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]姬路城[COLOR_REVERT]使城市防御增加所有城市的文化输出，并使其所有完全设防的单位每级提供+1文化。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大政治家[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]姬路城[COLOR_REVERT]使城市防御增加所有城市的文化输出，并使其所有完全设防的单位每级提供+1文化。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大政治家[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Himeji Castle[COLOR_REVERT] makes city defence increases culture output in all cities and makes all fully fortified units in its provide +1 culture per level. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Statesman[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: 伊什塔尔城门
TEXT.Chinese: 伊什塔尔城门
TEXT.French: Ishtar Gate

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]伊什塔尔门[COLOR_REVERT]允许您雇用每种类型的专家。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]伊什塔尔门[COLOR_REVERT]允许您雇用每种类型的专家。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ishtar Gate[COLOR_REVERT] allows you to hire one specialist of each type. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: 卢比扬卡
TEXT.Chinese: 卢比扬卡
TEXT.French: Lubyanka

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]鲁比扬卡[COLOR_REVERT]为你的所有专家增加了额外的间谍活动。这也增加了该市产生一位大政治家的几率。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]鲁比扬卡[COLOR_REVERT]为你的所有专家增加了额外的间谍活动。这也增加了该市产生一位大政治家的几率。
TEXT.French: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Lubyanka[COLOR_REVERT] adds additional espionage to all of your specialists. It also increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Statesman[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: 克久拉霍
TEXT.Chinese: 克久拉霍
TEXT.French: Khajuraho

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]卡朱拉霍[COLOR_REVERT]为你所在国宗教的所有建筑添加额外的食物。它也增加了这个城市产生一个大预言家的机会。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]卡朱拉霍[COLOR_REVERT]为你所在国宗教的所有建筑添加额外的食物。它也增加了这个城市产生一个大预言家的机会。
TEXT.French: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Khajuraho[COLOR_REVERT] adds additional food to all buildings of your state religion. It also increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: 圣巴西尔大教堂
TEXT.Chinese: 圣巴西尔大教堂
TEXT.French: St. Basil's Cathedral

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]圣巴西尔大教堂[COLOR_REVERT]增加了所有国家宗教建筑的产量，增加了该市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大政治家[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]圣巴西尔大教堂[COLOR_REVERT]增加了所有国家宗教建筑的产量，增加了该市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大政治家[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。
TEXT.French: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]St. Basil's Cathedral[COLOR_REVERT] increases the production of all state religion buildings and increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Statesman[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: 马丘比丘
TEXT.Chinese: 马丘比丘
TEXT.French: Machu Picchu

TEXT.English: 为所在城市范围内的每座山峰[ICON_BULLET]提供2[ICON_GOLD]
TEXT.Chinese: 为所在城市范围内的每座山峰[ICON_BULLET]提供2[ICON_GOLD]
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]+2[ICON_GOLD] per Peak in City Radius

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]马丘比丘[COLOR_REVERT]为所在城市21格范围内的每座[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]山峰[COLOR_REVERT]提供2[ICON_GOLD]。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]马丘比丘[COLOR_REVERT]为所在城市21格范围内的每座[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]山峰[COLOR_REVERT]提供2[ICON_GOLD]。
TEXT.French: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Machu Picchu[COLOR_REVERT] provides 2 gold for every [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Peak[COLOR_REVERT] in the city radius. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]大陵墓[COLOR_REVERT]增加您的黄金时期的长度百分之五十。它还增加了其城市产生一个大艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]大陵墓[COLOR_REVERT]增加您的黄金时期的长度百分之五十。它还增加了其城市产生一个大艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Great Mausoleum[COLOR_REVERT] increases the length of your Golden Ages by fifty percent. It also increases the odds of its city generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: 科尔多瓦清真寺
TEXT.Chinese: 科尔多瓦清真寺
TEXT.French: La Mezquita

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]科尔多瓦清真寺[COLOR_REVERT]提供2名免费专家。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大科学家[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]科尔多瓦清真寺[COLOR_REVERT]提供2名免费专家。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大科学家[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。
TEXT.French: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]La Mezquita[COLOR_REVERT] gives 2 free specialists. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Scientist[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: 一旦建成[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]五角大楼[COLOR_REVERT]，你所有新组建的单位将获得两个初始经验点。并使城市更有可能产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大间谍[COLOR_REVERT]。
TEXT.Chinese: 一旦建成[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]五角大楼[COLOR_REVERT]，你所有新组建的单位将获得两个初始经验点。并使城市更有可能产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大间谍[COLOR_REVERT]。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Pentagon[COLOR_REVERT] grants experience points to troops built in all cities and increases the chance that its city will generate a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Statesman[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: 圣索菲亚（君堡）
TEXT.Chinese: 圣索菲亚（君堡）
TEXT.French: The Hagia Sophia

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]圣索菲亚[COLOR_REVERT]可使你的工人效率更高，并可提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大工程师[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]圣索菲亚[COLOR_REVERT]可使你的工人效率更高，并可提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大工程师[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hagia Sophia[COLOR_REVERT] adds additional espionage to all buildings of your state religion. It also increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]总统山[COLOR_REVERT]可减少所有本国城市的厌战情绪，并提升该城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]总统山[COLOR_REVERT]可减少所有本国城市的厌战情绪，并提升该城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.French: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Mt. Rushmore[COLOR_REVERT] decreases war weariness in all cities in your civilization and increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]神谕宣示所[COLOR_REVERT]可使建造者免费获得两项科技，并可提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]历史伟人[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]神谕宣示所[COLOR_REVERT]可使建造者免费获得两项科技，并可提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]历史伟人[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Oracle[COLOR_REVERT] gives two free technologies of your current or previous era. It also increases the odds of its city generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]+2[ICON_PRODUCTION]用于水资源改善[NEWLINE][COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]需要20个城市半径内的海洋地块[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]+2[ICON_PRODUCTION]用于水资源改善[NEWLINE][COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]需要20个城市半径内的海洋地块[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]+2[ICON_PRODUCTION] for Water Improvements[NEWLINE][COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Requires 20 Water Tiles in City Radius[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]摩艾石像群[COLOR_REVERT]使所在城市的每片水域额外增加1单位产能。并提升[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大预言家[COLOR_REVERT]的出现几率。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]摩艾石像群[COLOR_REVERT]使所在城市的每片水域额外增加1单位产能。并提升[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大预言家[COLOR_REVERT]的出现几率。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Moai Statues[COLOR_REVERT] add bonus production to all [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Fishing Boats[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]High Sea Fishing Boats[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Whaling Boats[COLOR_REVERT] in your civilization. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]帕特农神殿[COLOR_REVERT]可提升你的文明产生[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]历史伟人[COLOR_REVERT]的几率，特别是[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]。并可大量增加文化产出。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]帕特农神殿[COLOR_REVERT]可提升你的文明产生[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]历史伟人[COLOR_REVERT]的几率，特别是[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]。并可大量增加文化产出。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Parthenon[COLOR_REVERT] increases the rate at which your civilization generates [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Great People[COLOR_REVERT]. It also increases the odds of its city generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: 空中花园
TEXT.Chinese: 空中花园
TEXT.French: The Hanging Gardens

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]洪水平原不会带来不健康[ICON_UNHEALTHY]
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]洪水平原不会带来不健康[ICON_UNHEALTHY]
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]No [ICON_UNHEALTHY] from Flood Plains

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]空中花园[COLOR_REVERT]消除了所有城市所有洪泛平原的不健康。它增加了城市生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大工程师[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]空中花园[COLOR_REVERT]消除了所有城市所有洪泛平原的不健康。它增加了城市生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大工程师[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hanging Gardens[COLOR_REVERT] removes the unhealthiness of all Flood Plains in all cities. It increases the odds of its city generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: 大运河
TEXT.Chinese: 大运河
TEXT.French: The Grand Canal

TEXT.English: 沿河地段的商业产值增加。
TEXT.Chinese: 沿河地段的商业产值增加。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Grand Canal[COLOR_REVERT] adds extra commerce to all river tiles worked by its city. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: 漂浮花园
TEXT.Chinese: 漂浮花园
TEXT.French: Floating Gardens

TEXT.English: 沿河地段提供粮食。
TEXT.Chinese: 沿河地段提供粮食。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Floating Gardens[COLOR_REVERT] give a large food bonus as well as increasing its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Merchant[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: 紫禁城
TEXT.Chinese: 紫禁城
TEXT.French: Forbidden Palace

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]城市维护费减少33%
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]城市维护费减少33%
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Civic Upkeep Reduced by 33%

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]故宫[COLOR_REVERT]降低了城市维护成本。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大政治家[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]故宫[COLOR_REVERT]降低了城市维护成本。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大政治家[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Forbidden Palace[COLOR_REVERT] reduces civic maintenance costs. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Statesman[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: 大报恩寺
TEXT.Chinese: 大报恩寺
TEXT.French: Porcelain Tower

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]交易无需开放边界
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]交易无需开放边界
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]No open borders required for trade

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]瓷塔[COLOR_REVERT]为您的所有[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]政治家[COLOR_REVERT]专家添加了额外的食物，并取消了贸易路线的开放边界要求。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大商人[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]瓷塔[COLOR_REVERT]为您的所有[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]政治家[COLOR_REVERT]专家添加了额外的食物，并取消了贸易路线的开放边界要求。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大商人[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Porcelain Tower[COLOR_REVERT] adds additional food to all of your [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Statesman[COLOR_REVERT] specialists and removes the open border requirement for trade routes. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Merchant[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: 金字塔
TEXT.Chinese: 金字塔
TEXT.French: The Pyramids

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]城市在使用粮食生产时继续增长
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]城市在使用粮食生产时继续增长
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Cities continue to grow when using Food for Production

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]金字塔[COLOR_REVERT]是世界地图的中心，让城市在用食物生产时得以发展。他们还增加了城市生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大工程师[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]金字塔[COLOR_REVERT]是世界地图的中心，让城市在用食物生产时得以发展。他们还增加了城市生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大工程师[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Pyramids[COLOR_REVERT] centers the world map and lets cities grow when they produce with food. They also increase their city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: 阿格拉红堡
TEXT.Chinese: 阿格拉红堡
TEXT.French: The Red Fort

TEXT.English: 红垒[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]增加了那些与建筑商交战的城市的厌战情绪。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大工程师[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。
TEXT.Chinese: 红垒[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]增加了那些与建筑商交战的城市的厌战情绪。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大工程师[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Red Fort[COLOR_REVERT] increases war weariness in the cities of those who go to war against its builder. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: 恩赐之地
TEXT.Chinese: 恩赐之地
TEXT.French: Graceland

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]恩赐之地[COLOR_REVERT]提供文化提升，并为您的文明提供七个[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]热门单曲[COLOR_REVERT]资源（它们提供快乐）。它增加了这个城市创造出一个大艺术家的可能性。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]恩赐之地[COLOR_REVERT]提供文化提升，并为您的文明提供七个[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]热门单曲[COLOR_REVERT]资源（它们提供快乐）。它增加了这个城市创造出一个大艺术家的可能性。
TEXT.French: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Graceland[COLOR_REVERT] grants a culture boost and provides your civilization with seven [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hit Singles[COLOR_REVERT] resources (which provide happiness). It increases the odds that its city will create a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: 圣马可大教堂
TEXT.Chinese: 圣马可大教堂
TEXT.French: San Marco Basilica

TEXT.English: 圣马可大教堂为您的所有专家添加了额外的黄金。它还增加了城市产生一个[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大商人[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.Chinese: 圣马可大教堂为您的所有专家添加了额外的黄金。它还增加了城市产生一个[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大商人[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.French: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]San Marco Basilica[COLOR_REVERT] adds additional gold to all of your specialists. It also increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Merchant[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]西斯庭教堂[COLOR_REVERT]使城市中的每位专业人员都能提供文化产出，并增加宗教建筑的文化产出。[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]西斯庭教堂[COLOR_REVERT]具有极高的文化值，还可提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]西斯庭教堂[COLOR_REVERT]使城市中的每位专业人员都能提供文化产出，并增加宗教建筑的文化产出。[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]西斯庭教堂[COLOR_REVERT]具有极高的文化值，还可提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Sistine Chapel[COLOR_REVERT] causes each specialist in every city to generate culture and increases the culture bonus provided by buildings of your state religion. It increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]天梯[COLOR_REVERT]可使所有城市建造太空飞船组件的速度+50%%，并提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大科学家[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]天梯[COLOR_REVERT]可使所有城市建造太空飞船组件的速度+50%%，并提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大科学家[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Space Elevator[COLOR_REVERT] increases spaceship part production in all of your cities and produces commerce for every constructed satellite and space project. It also increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Scientist[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: 如果你设定了国教，[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]螺旋尖塔[COLOR_REVERT]还可使所有宗教建筑产生金钱收入。并能提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]历史伟人[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.Chinese: 如果你设定了国教，[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]螺旋尖塔[COLOR_REVERT]还可使所有宗教建筑产生金钱收入。并能提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]历史伟人[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Spiral Minaret[COLOR_REVERT] gives all buildings of your state religion a gold bonus. It increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]自由女神像[COLOR_REVERT]可使所有城市免费获得一位专业人员。并可提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大工程师[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]自由女神像[COLOR_REVERT]可使所有城市免费获得一位专业人员。并可提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大工程师[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Statue of Liberty[COLOR_REVERT] gives all cities in your civilization one free specialist. It increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Merchant[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]征服时没有城市抵抗
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]征服时没有城市抵抗
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]No City Resistance on Conquest

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]宙斯神像[COLOR_REVERT]增加敌国家民众的厌战情绪。并提升[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]的出现几率。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]宙斯神像[COLOR_REVERT]增加敌国家民众的厌战情绪。并提升[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]的出现几率。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Statue of Zeus[COLOR_REVERT] removes city resistance on conquest. It increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: 狮身人面像
TEXT.Chinese: 狮身人面像
TEXT.French: Great Sphinx

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]创造奇迹时，食物被添加到生产中
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]创造奇迹时，食物被添加到生产中
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Food is added to Production when building Wonders

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]狮身人面像[COLOR_REVERT]允许用食物创造奇迹。它增加了这个城市产生一个大预言家的几率。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]狮身人面像[COLOR_REVERT]允许用食物创造奇迹。它增加了这个城市产生一个大预言家的几率。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Great Sphinx[COLOR_REVERT] allows wonders to be produces with food. It increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: 建成[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]泰姬陵[COLOR_REVERT]可立即触发本文明的[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]黄金时代[COLOR_REVERT]。并提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.Chinese: 建成[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]泰姬陵[COLOR_REVERT]可立即触发本文明的[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]黄金时代[COLOR_REVERT]。并提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Taj Mahal[COLOR_REVERT] begins a [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Golden Age[COLOR_REVERT] for your civilization. It increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: 阿耳特弥斯神庙
TEXT.Chinese: 阿耳特弥斯神庙
TEXT.French: The Temple of Artemis

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]阿尔忒弥斯神庙[COLOR_REVERT]提升城市商路的收益，并为所在城市免费提供一位[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]神学家[COLOR_REVERT]。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]阿尔忒弥斯神庙[COLOR_REVERT]提升城市商路的收益，并为所在城市免费提供一位[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]神学家[COLOR_REVERT]。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Temple of Artemis[COLOR_REVERT] increases its city's trade route income and gives a free [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Priest[COLOR_REVERT]. It increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Merchant[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: 兵马俑
TEXT.Chinese: 兵马俑
TEXT.French: Terracotta Army

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]对野蛮人战斗获得经验不再有上限[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]对野蛮人战斗获得经验可计入大军事家点数
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]对野蛮人战斗获得经验不再有上限[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]对野蛮人战斗获得经验可计入大军事家点数
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Unlimited experience from Barbarian Units[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Victories against Barbarians contribute to Great General birth

TEXT.English: 兵马俑[COLOR_REVERT]消除了从野蛮人那里获得的经验的限制，允许野蛮人为大军事家出生做出贡献。它还增加了城市在创建军事单位时的产量，并增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。
TEXT.Chinese: 兵马俑[COLOR_REVERT]消除了从野蛮人那里获得的经验的限制，允许野蛮人为大军事家的出生做出贡献。它还增加了城市在创建军事单位时的产量，并增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Terracotta Army[COLOR_REVERT] removes the limit of experience gained from barbarians and allows barbarians to contribute to Great General birth. It also increases its city's production when creating military units and increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: 狄奥多西城墙
TEXT.Chinese: 狄奥多西城墙
TEXT.French: Theodosian Walls

TEXT.English: 狄奥多西城墙[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]增加了一个城市对火药前部队的防御。这也增加了他们的城市产生一个[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大工程师[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。
TEXT.Chinese: 狄奥多西城墙[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]增加了一个城市对火药前部队的防御。这也增加了他们的城市产生一个[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大工程师[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Theodosian Walls[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's defenses against pre-gunpowder units. It also increases their city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: 托普卡帕宫
TEXT.Chinese: 托普卡帕宫
TEXT.French: Topkapi Palace

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]每回合可以强制征召一个额外的单位。
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]每回合可以强制征召一个额外的单位。
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Extra initial production in conquered cities

TEXT.English: 托普卡帕宫[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]在被征服的城市中额外提供初始制作。这也增加了他们城市产生一个大政治家的机会。
TEXT.Chinese: 托普卡帕宫[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]在被征服的城市中额外提供初始制作。这也增加了他们城市产生一个大政治家的机会。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Topkapi Palace[COLOR_REVERT] grants extra initial production in the conquered city. It also increase their city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Statesman[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: 三峡大坝
TEXT.Chinese: 三峡大坝
TEXT.French: Itaipu Dam

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]三峡大坝[COLOR_REVERT]为同一大陆上的所有城市提供清洁能源。它增加了它的城市将产生一个[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大工程师[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]三峡大坝[COLOR_REVERT]为同一大陆上的所有城市提供清洁能源。它增加了它的城市将产生一个[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大工程师[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Itaipu Dam[COLOR_REVERT] provides clean power to all cities on the same continent. It increases the odds that its city will generate a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: 特拉法加广场
TEXT.Chinese: 特拉法加广场
TEXT.French: Trafalgar Square

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]需要一个三级及以上晋升的海军单位
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]需要一个三级及以上晋升的海军单位
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Requires a naval unit of level three or higher

TEXT.English: 海军建造速度加快，所在城市建造的海军单位获得额外的经验值。
TEXT.Chinese: 海军建造速度加快，所在城市建造的海军单位获得额外的经验值。
TEXT.French: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Trafalgar Square[COLOR_REVERT] enables ships to be built much faster and the ships start off with additional experience points. It also increase its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Statesman[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: 桑科雷大学
TEXT.Chinese: 桑科雷大学
TEXT.French: University of Sankore

TEXT.English: 如果你确立了官方信仰，[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]桑科雷大学[COLOR_REVERT]可使本文明所有宗教建筑提供额外科研点数。
TEXT.Chinese: 如果你确立了官方信仰，[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]桑科雷大学[COLOR_REVERT]可使本文明所有宗教建筑提供额外科研点数。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]University of Sankore[COLOR_REVERT] adds extra commerce to all desert tiles for all cities. It also increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Scientist[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]凡尔赛宫[COLOR_REVERT]能减少附近城市的维护费，相当于第二座[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]紫禁城[COLOR_REVERT]。并能提升产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]凡尔赛宫[COLOR_REVERT]能减少附近城市的维护费，相当于第二座[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]紫禁城[COLOR_REVERT]。并能提升产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.French: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Versailles[COLOR_REVERT] creates a free [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Estate[COLOR_REVERT] in every city and gives its city two free [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Statesman[COLOR_REVERT] specialists. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Statesman[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]联合国[COLOR_REVERT]用于进行触发[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]外交胜利[COLOR_REVERT]的选举。可确保你作为此项选举的候选者之一，并提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大商业家[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]联合国[COLOR_REVERT]用于进行触发[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]外交胜利[COLOR_REVERT]的选举。可确保你作为此项选举的候选者之一，并提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大商业家[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]United Nations[COLOR_REVERT] triggers [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Diplomatic Victory[COLOR_REVERT] elections. It guarantees that you will be a candidate in those elections and increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Statesman[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: 威斯敏斯特宫
TEXT.Chinese: 威斯敏斯特宫
TEXT.French: Westminster Palace

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]威斯敏斯特宫[COLOR_REVERT]在每个城市创建一个免费的[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]法院[COLOR_REVERT]。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大政治家[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]威斯敏斯特宫[COLOR_REVERT]在每个城市创建一个免费的[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]法院[COLOR_REVERT]。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大政治家[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Westminster Palace[COLOR_REVERT] creates a free [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Courthouse[COLOR_REVERT] in every city. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Statesman[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: 阿帕达纳宫
TEXT.Chinese: 阿帕达纳宫
TEXT.French: Apadana Palace

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]阿帕达纳宫殿[COLOR_REVERT]在每个城市创建了一个免费的[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]纪念碑[COLOR_REVERT]，并使您的工人更快地进行改进。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大工程师[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]阿帕达纳宫殿[COLOR_REVERT]在每个城市创建了一个免费的[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]纪念碑[COLOR_REVERT]，并使您的工人更快地进行改进。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大工程师[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Apadana Palace[COLOR_REVERT] creates a free [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Monument[COLOR_REVERT] in every city and causes your workers to build improvements faster. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: 祗陀林佛塔
TEXT.Chinese: 祗陀林佛塔
TEXT.French: Jetavanaramaya

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Jetavanaramaya[COLOR_REVERT]为您的所有[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]专家添加了额外的食物。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Jetavanaramaya[COLOR_REVERT]为您的所有[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]专家添加了额外的食物。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Jetavanaramaya[COLOR_REVERT] adds additional food to all of your [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Artist[COLOR_REVERT] specialists. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: 贡德沙普尔
TEXT.Chinese: 贡德沙普尔
TEXT.French: Gondeshapur

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]贡德沙普尔[COLOR_REVERT]为本市所有符合条件的建筑单位提供[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Medic I[COLOR_REVERT]提升，并为所有[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]科学家[COLOR_REVERT]专家添加额外食物。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大科学家[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]贡德沙普尔[COLOR_REVERT]为本市所有符合条件的建筑单位提供[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Medic I[COLOR_REVERT]提升，并为所有[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]科学家[COLOR_REVERT]专家添加额外食物。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大科学家[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。
TEXT.French: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Gondeshapur[COLOR_REVERT] gives all eligible units built in this city the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Medic I[COLOR_REVERT] promotion and adds additional food to all of your [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Scientist[COLOR_REVERT] specialists. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Scientist[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: 普兰巴南神庙
TEXT.Chinese: 普兰巴南神庙
TEXT.French: Prambanan

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]所有城市在增长后都会额外存储25%的[ICON_FOOD]
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]所有城市在增长后都会额外存储25%的[ICON_FOOD]
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]All cities store an additional 25% [ICON_FOOD] after growth

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Prambanan[COLOR_REVERT]让您的所有城市在增长后存储额外的食物。它还增加了城市生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大先知[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Prambanan[COLOR_REVERT]让您的所有城市在增长后存储额外的食物。它还增加了城市生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大先知[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。
TEXT.French: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Prambanan[COLOR_REVERT] lets all your cities store extra food after growth. It also increases its city's chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: 瞻星台
TEXT.Chinese: 瞻星台
TEXT.French: Cheomseongdae

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Cheomseongdae[COLOR_REVERT]使用科学滑块增加城市的幸福输出。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大科学家[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Cheomseongdae[COLOR_REVERT]使用科学滑块增加城市的幸福输出。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大科学家[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。
TEXT.French: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Cheomseongdae[COLOR_REVERT] increases its city's happiness output from using the science slider. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Scientist[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: 那烂陀大学
TEXT.Chinese: 那烂陀大学
TEXT.French: Nalanda University

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]纳兰达大学[COLOR_REVERT]为你所在国宗教的所有建筑增加了额外的科学知识。它也增加了这个城市产生一个大科学家的机会。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]纳兰达大学[COLOR_REVERT]为你所在国宗教的所有建筑增加了额外的科学知识。它也增加了这个城市产生一个大科学家的机会。
TEXT.French: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Nalanda University[COLOR_REVERT] adds additional science to all buildings of your state religion. It also increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Scientist[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: 骑士堡
TEXT.Chinese: 骑士堡
TEXT.French: Krak des Chevaliers

TEXT.English: 被击败的城市防御者撤退到你的首都
TEXT.Chinese: 被击败的城市防御者撤退到你的首都
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Defeated city defenders retreat to your capital

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]骑士堡[COLOR_REVERT]在每个城市创建一个免费的[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]城堡[COLOR_REVERT]，并将被击败的城市防御者转移到你的首都。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大工程师[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]骑士堡[COLOR_REVERT]在每个城市创建一个免费的[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]城堡[COLOR_REVERT]，并将被击败的城市防御者转移到你的首都。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大工程师[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Krak des Chevaliers[COLOR_REVERT] creates a free [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Castle[COLOR_REVERT] in every city and moves defeated city defenders to your capital. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: 智慧之家
TEXT.Chinese: 智慧之家
TEXT.French: House of Wisdom

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]+200% [ICON_RESEARCH]来自大人物的发现
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]+200% [ICON_RESEARCH]来自大人物的发现
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]+200% [ICON_RESEARCH] from Great People discoveries

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]智慧之家[COLOR_REVERT]增加了伟人发现的研究推动。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大科学家[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]智慧之家[COLOR_REVERT]增加了伟人发现的研究推动。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大科学家[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]House of Wisdom[COLOR_REVERT] increases the research boost from Great People discoveries. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Scientist[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: 萨尔萨佛
TEXT.Chinese: 萨尔萨佛
TEXT.French: Salsal Buddha

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]即使在战争期间，贸易路线仍然保持联系
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]即使在战争期间，贸易路线仍然保持联系
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Trade routes remain connected even during war

TEXT.English: 萨尔萨佛允许在战争期间连接贸易路线。它还增加了城市生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大先知[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。
TEXT.Chinese: 萨尔萨佛允许在战争期间连接贸易路线。它还增加了城市生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大先知[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Salsal Buddha[COLOR_REVERT] allows trade routes to be connected during war. It also increases its city's chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: 圣索菲亚大教堂（基辅）
TEXT.Chinese: 圣索菲亚大教堂（基辅）
TEXT.French: Saint Sophia's Cathedral

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]圣索菲亚大教堂[COLOR_REVERT]为您所有的[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]商人[COLOR_REVERT]专家添加额外的食物。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大政治家[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]圣索菲亚大教堂[COLOR_REVERT]为您所有的[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]商人[COLOR_REVERT]专家添加额外的食物。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大政治家[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。
TEXT.French: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Saint Sophia's Cathedral[COLOR_REVERT] adds additional food to all of your [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Merchant[COLOR_REVERT] specialists. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Statesman[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: 花之圣母大教堂
TEXT.Chinese: 花之圣母大教堂
TEXT.French: Santa Maria del Fiore

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]花之圣母大教堂[COLOR_REVERT]提高了其城市伟人积分的比率。它也增加了这个城市产生一个大艺术家的机会。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]花之圣母大教堂[COLOR_REVERT]提高了其城市伟人积分的比率。它也增加了这个城市产生一个大艺术家的机会。
TEXT.French: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Santa Maria del Fiore[COLOR_REVERT] increases the rate of its city Great People points. It also increases its city's chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: 德里铁柱
TEXT.Chinese: 德里铁柱
TEXT.French: Iron Pillar

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]铁柱[COLOR_REVERT]在每个城市创建一个免费的[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]锻造[COLOR_REVERT]。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大工程师[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]铁柱[COLOR_REVERT]在每个城市创建一个免费的[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]锻造[COLOR_REVERT]。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大工程师[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Iron Pillar[COLOR_REVERT] creates a free [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Forge[COLOR_REVERT] in every city. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: 银树喷泉
TEXT.Chinese: 银树喷泉
TEXT.French: Silver Tree Fountain

TEXT.English: 当一个大将军出现时，另一个伟人就诞生了
TEXT.Chinese: 当一个大将军出现时，另一个伟人就诞生了
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Another great person is born whenever a Great General appears

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]银树喷泉[COLOR_REVERT]在[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大将军[COLOR_REVERT]诞生时创造了一个自由的伟人。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大政治家[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]银树喷泉[COLOR_REVERT]在[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大将军[COLOR_REVERT]诞生时创造了一个自由的伟人。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大政治家[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Silver Tree Fountain[COLOR_REVERT] creates a free Great Person when a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great General[COLOR_REVERT] is born. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Statesman[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: 圣托马斯教堂
TEXT.Chinese: 圣托马斯教堂
TEXT.French: Saint Thomas Church

TEXT.English: 圣托马斯教堂[COLOR_REVERT]增加你所有城市的幸福感。它增加了这个城市创造出一个大艺术家的机会。
TEXT.Chinese: 圣托马斯教堂[COLOR_REVERT]增加你所有城市的幸福感。它增加了这个城市创造出一个大艺术家的机会。
TEXT.French: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Saint Thomas Church[COLOR_REVERT] increases the happiness of all of your cities. It increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: 埃斯科里亚尔宫
TEXT.Chinese: 埃斯科里亚尔宫
TEXT.French: El Escorial

TEXT.English: 我们在新大陆的定居者和征服者从新殖民地%s2获得了额外的%d1[ICON_GOLD]。
TEXT.Chinese: 我们在新大陆的定居者和征服者从新殖民地%s2获得了额外的%d1[ICON_GOLD]。
TEXT.French: Our settlers and conquistadors in the New World have acquired an additional %d1 [ICON_GOLD] from the new colony of %s2.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]获得每个殖民地的[ICON_GOLD]
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]获得每个殖民地的[ICON_GOLD]
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Receives [ICON_GOLD] for every acquired colony

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]El Escorial[COLOR_REVERT]为每个获得的殖民地提供黄金。它还增加了这个城市产生一位大政治家的机会。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]El Escorial[COLOR_REVERT]为每个获得的殖民地提供黄金。它还增加了这个城市产生一位大政治家的机会。
TEXT.French: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]El Escorial[COLOR_REVERT] provides gold for every acquired colony. It also increases its city's chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Statesman[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: 贝伦塔
TEXT.Chinese: 贝伦塔
TEXT.French: Torre de Belem

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Torre de Belem[COLOR_REVERT]增加了该市的外贸路线收入。它增加了城市生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大商人[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Torre de Belem[COLOR_REVERT]增加了该市的外贸路线收入。它增加了城市生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大商人[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。

TEXT.Chinese: 哈勃太空望远镜为你的所有卫星增加了额外的科学知识。它还增加了这个城市产生一个大科学家的可能性。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hubble Space Telescope[COLOR_REVERT] adds additional science to all of your settled satellites. It also increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Scientist[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]+3 [ICON_RESEARCH]卫星
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]+3 [ICON_RESEARCH]卫星
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]+3[ICON_RESEARCH] for Satellites

TEXT.English: 英法海底隧道
TEXT.Chinese: 英法海底隧道
TEXT.French: Channel Tunnel

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]+100%[ICON_TRADE]收入与友好关系
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]+100%[ICON_TRADE]收入与友好关系
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]+100% [ICON_TRADE] income with friendly relations

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]英法海底隧道[COLOR_REVERT]增加了与友好文明的所有贸易路线的产量。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大工程师[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]英法海底隧道[COLOR_REVERT]增加了与友好文明的所有贸易路线的产量。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大工程师[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Channel Tunnel[COLOR_REVERT] increases the yield of all trade routes with civilizations with friendly relations. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: 三角洲工程
TEXT.Chinese: 三角洲工程
TEXT.French: Delta Works

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]只需要城市半径内的平地
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]只需要城市半径内的平地
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Requires only flat land in city radius

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]三角洲工程[COLOR_REVERT]为其所在城市生产的所有水砖增加了额外的食物、生产和商业。它还增加了城市产生一个[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大商人[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]三角洲工程[COLOR_REVERT]为其所在城市生产的所有水砖增加了额外的食物、生产和商业。它还增加了城市产生一个[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大商人[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.French: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Delta Works[COLOR_REVERT] adds extra food, production and commerce to all water tiles worked by its city. It also increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Merchant[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: 铁穹防御系统
TEXT.Chinese: 铁穹防御系统
TEXT.French: Iron Dome

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]在自己的地盘内有50%的截获机会
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]在自己的地盘内有50%的截获机会
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]+50% intercept chance within own territory

TEXT.English: [COLOR U BUILDING U TEXT]铁穹防御系统[COLOR U REVERT]增加在你自己领地的拦截几率。它还增加了这个城市产生一个大科学家的机会。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR U BUILDING U TEXT]铁穹防御系统[COLOR U REVERT]增加在你自己领地的拦截几率。它还增加了这个城市产生一个大科学家的机会。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Iron Dome[COLOR_REVERT] increases the interception chance in your own territory. It also increases its city's chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Scientist[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: 东方明珠塔
TEXT.Chinese: 东方明珠塔
TEXT.French: Oriental Pearl Tower

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]+2 [ICON_RESEARCH]每个城市人口
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]+2 [ICON_RESEARCH]每个城市人口
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]+2[ICON_RESEARCH] per city population

TEXT.English: 东方明珠塔[COLRYBUGIONTION ]提供了2人口科学在其城市。它还增加了城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大商人[COLOR_REVERT]的几率
TEXT.Chinese: 东方明珠塔[COLRYBUGIONTION ]提供了2人口科学在其城市。它还增加了城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大商人[COLOR_REVERT]的几率
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Oriental Pearl Tower[COLOR_REVERT] provides 2 science per population in its city. It also increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Merchant[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: 滨海湾花园
TEXT.Chinese: 滨海湾花园
TEXT.French: Gardens by the Bay

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]+2[ICON_COMMERCE] 每超出[ICON_HEALTHY]
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]+2[ICON_COMMERCE] 每超出[ICON_HEALTHY]
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]+2[ICON_COMMERCE] per excess [ICON_HEALTHY]

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]滨海湾花园[COLOR_REVERT]为其城市的过度健康提供了商业机会。它还增加了这个城市创造出一个大艺术家的可能性。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]滨海湾花园[COLOR_REVERT]为其城市的过度健康提供了商业机会。它还增加了这个城市创造出一个大艺术家的可能性。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Gardens by the Bay[COLOR_REVERT] provides commerce for excess health in its city. It also increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: 布莱切利园
TEXT.Chinese: 布莱切利园
TEXT.French: Bletchley Park

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]+50%几率避免间谍侦测[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+50%几率侦测敌人间谍
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]+50%几率避免间谍侦测[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+50%几率侦测敌人间谍
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]+50% chance to avoid spy detection[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+50% chance to detect enemy spies

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]布莱奇利公园[COLOR_REVERT]减少你的间谍被侦测到的变化，增加侦测敌人间谍的机会。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大科学家[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]布莱奇利公园[COLOR_REVERT]减少你的间谍被侦测到的变化，增加侦测敌人间谍的机会。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大科学家[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。
TEXT.French: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Bletchley Park[COLOR_REVERT] decreases the change your spies are being detected and increases the chance to detect enemy spies. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Scientist[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: 祖国母亲在呼唤雕像
TEXT.Chinese: 祖国母亲在呼唤雕像
TEXT.French: The Motherland Calls

TEXT.English: 在我们的%s1失败后，在%s2中又征召了一支保卫祖国的部队！
TEXT.Chinese: 在我们的%s1失败后，在%s2中又征召了一支保卫祖国的部队！
TEXT.French: After the defeat of our %s1 another unit has been drafted in %s2 to defend the motherland!

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]当3级或更高级别的单位丢失时，另一个单位诞生
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]当3级或更高级别的单位丢失时，另一个单位诞生
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Another unit is drafted whenever a unit of level 3 or higher is lost

TEXT.English: 当3级或更高级别的单位丢失时，祖国调用[COLOR_REVERT]绘制一个单位。它也增加了这个城市产生一个大艺术家的机会。
TEXT.Chinese: 当3级或更高级别的单位丢失时，祖国调用[COLOR_REVERT]绘制一个单位。它也增加了这个城市产生一个大艺术家的机会。
TEXT.French: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Motherland Calls[COLOR_REVERT] drafts an unit when a unit of level 3 or higher is lost. It also increases its city's chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: 欧盟总部大厦
TEXT.Chinese: 欧盟总部大厦
TEXT.French: Berlaymont

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]+2个可能的防御协议[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+每个防御协议1个免费专家
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]+2个可能的防御协议[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+每个防御协议1个免费专家
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]+2 possible defensive pacts[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+1 free specialist per defensive pact

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Berlaymont[COLOR_REVERT]增加你可以签署的防御协议的限制，并为每个签署的防御协议提供1名免费专家。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大政治家[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Berlaymont[COLOR_REVERT]增加你可以签署的防御协议的限制，并为每个签署的防御协议提供1名免费专家。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大政治家[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。
TEXT.French: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Berlaymont[COLOR_REVERT] increases the limit of defensive pacts you can sign and provides provides 1 free specialist per signed defensive pact. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Statesman[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: 国际热核聚变实验堆
TEXT.Chinese: 国际热核聚变实验堆
TEXT.French: ITER

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]+1[ICON_COMMERCE] 所有城市每消耗一次电力
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]+1[ICON_COMMERCE] 所有城市每消耗一次电力
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]+1[ICON_COMMERCE] per power consumed in all cities

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]ITER[COLOR_REVERT]为同一大陆上的所有城市提供清洁电力，并为所有城市的所有消耗电力提供商业。它增加了它的城市产生一个大科学家的可能性。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]ITER[COLOR_REVERT]为同一大陆上的所有城市提供清洁电力，并为所有城市的所有消耗电力提供商业。它增加了它的城市产生一个大科学家的可能性。
TEXT.French: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]ITER[COLOR_REVERT] provides clean power to all cities on the same continent and provides commerce for all consumed power in all cities. It increases the odds that its city will generate a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Scientist[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: 大型强子对撞机
TEXT.Chinese: 大型强子对撞机
TEXT.French: Large Hadron Collider

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]大型强子对撞机[COLOR_REVERT]极大地提高了城市的科学产出。它还增加了这个城市产生一个大科学家的机会。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]大型强子对撞机[COLOR_REVERT]极大地提高了城市的科学产出。它还增加了这个城市产生一个大科学家的机会。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Large Hadron Collider[COLOR_REVERT] greatly increases the scientific output of its city. It also increases its city's chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Scientist[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: 印度拉贾斯坦邦高地城堡
TEXT.Chinese: 印度拉贾斯坦邦高地城堡
TEXT.French: Vijaya Stambha

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]印度拉贾斯坦邦高地城堡[COLOR_REVERT]为本市所有符合条件的建筑单位提供[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]城市卫戍I[COLOR_REVERT]升级，并增加[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大军事家[COLOR_REVERT]出现。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大工程师[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]印度拉贾斯坦邦高地城堡[COLOR_REVERT]为本市所有符合条件的建筑单位提供[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]城市卫戍I[COLOR_REVERT]升级，并增加[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大军事家[COLOR_REVERT]出现。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大工程师[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Vijaya Stambha[COLOR_REVERT] gives all eligible units built in this city the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]City Garrison I[COLOR_REVERT] promotion and increases [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great General[COLOR_REVERT] emergence. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]国家[ICON_RELIGION]建筑的双倍[ICON_PRODUCTION]
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]国家[ICON_RELIGION]建筑的双倍[ICON_PRODUCTION]
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Double [ICON_PRODUCTION] for state [ICON_RELIGION] buildings

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]瑞光大金塔[COLOR_REVERT]可对所在文明启用所有[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]宗教信仰[COLOR_REVERT]类内政法令，还可提升[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大预言家[COLOR_REVERT]的出现几率。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]瑞光大金塔[COLOR_REVERT]可对所在文明启用所有[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]宗教信仰[COLOR_REVERT]类内政法令，还可提升[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大预言家[COLOR_REVERT]的出现几率。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Shwedagon Paya[COLOR_REVERT] doubles the construction speed of the buildings of your state religion. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: 沙漠上的[ICON_BULLET]+1[ICON_COMMERCE]
TEXT.Chinese: 沙漠上的[ICON_BULLET]+1[ICON_COMMERCE]
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]+1[ICON_COMMERCE] on Desert

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]建造大教堂只需要三座寺庙
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]建造大教堂只需要三座寺庙
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Only three Temples required to build Cathedrals

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]巴黎圣母院[COLOR_REVERT]提升同一大陆所有城市的快乐度。并可提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]巴黎圣母院[COLOR_REVERT]提升同一大陆所有城市的快乐度。并可提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.French: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Notre Dame[COLOR_REVERT] reduces the mumber of temples required to build Cathedrals to three. It also increases its city's chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]+1[ICON_MOVES]对于平民单位
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]+1[ICON_MOVES]对于平民单位
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]+1[ICON_MOVES] for civilian units

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]克里姆林宫[COLOR_REVERT]可减少加速生产的花费并可提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大间谍[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]克里姆林宫[COLOR_REVERT]可减少加速生产的花费并可提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大间谍[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Kremlin[COLOR_REVERT] increases all cities' defenses by 25%% and increases the movement of civilian units by 1. It improves the odds of its city generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Statesman[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: 佩特拉古城
TEXT.Chinese: 佩特拉古城
TEXT.French: Al Khazneh

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]需要城市半径内的绿洲
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]需要城市半径内的绿洲
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Requires Oasis in city radius

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Al-Khazneh[COLOR_REVERT]在所有城市提供自由贸易路线。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大商人[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Al-Khazneh[COLOR_REVERT]在所有城市提供自由贸易路线。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大商人[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。
TEXT.French: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Al Khazneh[COLOR_REVERT] provides a free trade route in all cities. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Merchant[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: 阿拉穆特城堡
TEXT.Chinese: 阿拉穆特城堡
TEXT.French: Alamut Fortress

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]阿拉穆特城堡[COLOR_REVERT]为[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]间谍单元[COLOR_REVERT]提供大量经验。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大政治家[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]阿拉穆特城堡[COLOR_REVERT]为[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]间谍单元[COLOR_REVERT]提供大量经验。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大政治家[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。
TEXT.French: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Alamut Fortress[COLOR_REVERT] grants a lot of experience to [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Espionage Units[COLOR_REVERT]. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Statesman[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: 阿索斯山修道院
TEXT.Chinese: 阿索斯山修道院
TEXT.French: Mount Athos

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]建筑物里有两个[ICON_GREATPEOPLE]
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]建筑物里有两个[ICON_GREATPEOPLE]
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Double [ICON_GREATPEOPLE] from Buildings

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]阿索斯山修道院[COLOR_REVERT]使所有建筑的大人物点数加倍。它还增加了城市生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大先知[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]阿索斯山修道院[COLOR_REVERT]使所有建筑的大人物点数加倍。它还增加了城市生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大先知[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。
TEXT.French: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Mount Athos[COLOR_REVERT] doubles the Great People Points from all buildings. It also increases its city's chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: 国际种子库
TEXT.Chinese: 国际种子库
TEXT.French: Global Seed Vault

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]需要在城市半径范围内的苔原[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+1 [ICON_RESEARCH]每个农场、稻田、果园和种植园资源
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]需要在城市半径范围内的苔原[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+1 [ICON_RESEARCH]每个农场、稻田、果园和种植园资源
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Requires Tundra in city radius[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+1 [ICON_RESEARCH] per Farm, Paddy Field, Orchard and Plantation resource

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]全球种子库[COLOR_REVERT]为每个可用的农场、稻田、果园和种植园资源提供科学依据。它还增加了这个城市产生一个大科学家的可能性。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]全球种子库[COLOR_REVERT]为每个可用的农场、稻田、果园和种植园资源提供科学依据。它还增加了这个城市产生一个大科学家的可能性。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Global Seed Vault[COLOR_REVERT] provides science for each available Farm, Paddy Field, Orchard and Plantation resource. It also increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Scientist[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: 瓜达卢佩圣母堂
TEXT.Chinese: 瓜达卢佩圣母堂
TEXT.French: Guadalupe Basilica

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]不能建在同一个大陆上的天主教圣地[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+1[ICON_GOLD]每个天主教城市在同一个大陆上
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]不能建在同一个大陆上的天主教圣地[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+1[ICON_GOLD]每个天主教城市在同一个大陆上
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Cannot be built on the same continent as the Catholic Shrine[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+1 [ICON_GOLD] per Catholic city on the same continent

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]瓜达卢佩大教堂[COLOR_REVERT]为该城市大陆上每一个信奉[COLOR_REVERT]天主教[COLOR_REVERT]的城市每转产生一枚金币。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大先知[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]瓜达卢佩大教堂[COLOR_REVERT]为该城市大陆上每一个信奉[COLOR_REVERT]天主教[COLOR_REVERT]的城市每转产生一枚金币。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大先知[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。
TEXT.French: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Guadalupe Basilica[COLOR_REVERT] produces one gold each turn for every city on the continent of its city that practises [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Catholicism[COLOR_REVERT]. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: 安托内利尖塔
TEXT.Chinese: 安托内利尖塔
TEXT.French: Mole Antonelliana

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]+2[ICON_PRODUCTION]在城市半径内的每个峰值
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]+2[ICON_PRODUCTION]在城市半径内的每个峰值
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]+2 [ICON_PRODUCTION] per Peak in city radius

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]安托内利尖塔[COLOR_REVERT]为城市半径内的每个[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]峰值[COLOR_REVERT]提供2个产品。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大工程师[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]安托内利尖塔[COLOR_REVERT]为城市半径内的每个[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]峰值[COLOR_REVERT]提供2个产品。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大工程师[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Mole Antonelliana[COLOR_REVERT] provides 2 production for every [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Peak[COLOR_REVERT] in the city radius. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: 古尔埃米尔陵
TEXT.Chinese: 古尔埃米尔陵
TEXT.French: Gur-e-Amir

TEXT.English: 我们的军队在征服%s2的过程中掠夺了%d1[ICON_CULTURE]，并将其带到了%s3。
TEXT.Chinese: 我们的军队在征服%s2的过程中掠夺了%d1[ICON_CULTURE]，并将其带到了%s3。
TEXT.French: Our armies have plundered %d1 [ICON_CULTURE] during their conquest of %s2 and brought it to %s3.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]城市获得额外的[ICON_CULTURE]等同于从被俘城市掠夺的[ICON_GOLD]
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]城市获得额外的[ICON_CULTURE]等同于从被俘城市掠夺的[ICON_GOLD]
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]City receives additional [ICON_CULTURE] equal to [ICON_GOLD] plundered from captured cities

TEXT.English: 当征服城市时，[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]古尔埃米尔[COLOR_REVERT]为城市提供了文化。它也增加了这个城市产生一个大艺术家的机会。
TEXT.Chinese: 当征服城市时，[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]古尔埃米尔[COLOR_REVERT]为城市提供了文化。它也增加了这个城市产生一个大艺术家的机会。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Gur-e-Amir[COLOR_REVERT] provides culture in its city when conquering cities. It also increases its city's chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: 印度莲花寺
TEXT.Chinese: 印度莲花寺
TEXT.French: Lotus Temple

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]需要至少4个宗教[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+1 [ICON_FOOD] per Non-State [ICON_RELIGION] 在所有城市
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]需要至少4个宗教[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+1 [ICON_FOOD] per Non-State [ICON_RELIGION] 在所有城市
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Requires at least four religions[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+1 [ICON_FOOD] per Non-State [ICON_RELIGION] in all cities

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]印度莲花寺[COLOR_REVERT]在所有城市为每个非国家宗教提供1种食物。它还增加了城市生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大先知[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]印度莲花寺[COLOR_REVERT]在所有城市为每个非国家宗教提供1种食物。它还增加了城市生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大先知[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Lotus Temple[COLOR_REVERT] provides 1 food per non-state religion in all cities. It also increases its city's chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: 阿庇乌水渠
TEXT.Chinese: 阿庇乌水渠
TEXT.French: Aqua Appia

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]阿庇乌水渠[COLOR_REVERT]改善了城市的健康状况。它增加了城市生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大工程师[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]阿庇乌水渠[COLOR_REVERT]改善了城市的健康状况。它增加了城市生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大工程师[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Aqua Appia[COLOR_REVERT] improves the health of your cities. It increases the odds of its city generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: 琥珀宫
TEXT.Chinese: 琥珀宫
TEXT.French: Amber Room

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]其他文明更愿意加入防御条约[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]分享防御条约伙伴的黄金时代
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]其他文明更愿意加入防御条约[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]分享防御条约伙伴的黄金时代
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Other civilization are more willing to enter into defensive pacts[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Shares golden ages of defensive pact partners

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]琥珀宫[COLOR_REVERT]增加了其他文明加入防御契约的意愿，并与防御契约伙伴共享黄金时代。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]琥珀宫[COLOR_REVERT]增加了其他文明加入防御契约的意愿，并与防御契约伙伴共享黄金时代。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Amber Room[COLOR_REVERT] increases the willingness of other civilizations to enter into defensive pact and shares golden ages with defensive pact partners. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: 万国宫
TEXT.Chinese: 万国宫
TEXT.French: Palace of Nations

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]大会每四个回合举行一次[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]你的城市不能在国会被要求[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]其他文明更愿意在国会批准你的要求
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]大会每四个回合举行一次[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]你的城市不能在国会被要求[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]其他文明更愿意在国会批准你的要求
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Congresses occur every four turns[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Your cities cannot be demanded in Congress[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Other civilizations are more willing to approve your demands in Congress

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]万国宫[COLOR_REVERT]保护你的城市不被国会要求，其他文明更愿意在国会批准你的要求。它使国会每四个回合举行一次。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大政治家[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]万国宫[COLOR_REVERT]保护你的城市不被国会要求，其他文明更愿意在国会批准你的要求。它使国会每四个回合举行一次。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大政治家[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Palace of Nations[COLOR_REVERT] defends your cities from being demanded in Congress and other civilizations are more willing to approve your demands in Congress. It makes Congresses occur every four turns. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Statesman[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: 凯旋门
TEXT.Chinese: 凯旋门
TEXT.French: Triumphal Arch

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]+单位提升时50%治疗
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]+单位提升时50%治疗
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]+50% healing when units are promoted

TEXT.English: [COLOR U BUILDING U TEXT]凯旋门[COLOR U REVERT]在你的单位提升时完全治愈它们。它还增加了这个城市产生一位大政治家的机会。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR U BUILDING U TEXT]凯旋门[COLOR U REVERT]在你的单位提升时完全治愈它们。它还增加了这个城市产生一位大政治家的机会。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Triumphal Arch[COLOR_REVERT] completely heals your units when they are promoted. It also increases its city's chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Statesman[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: 大都会地铁
TEXT.Chinese: 大都会地铁
TEXT.French: Metropolitain

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]+1 [ICON_COMMERCE]在城市建筑上每+2[ICON_CULTURE]
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]+1 [ICON_COMMERCE]在城市建筑上每+2[ICON_CULTURE]
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]+1[ICON_COMMERCE] for every +2[ICON_CULTURE] on buildings in the city

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]大都会地铁[COLOR_REVERT]增加了城市中每栋建筑的商业产出。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大工程师[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]大都会地铁[COLOR_REVERT]增加了城市中每栋建筑的商业产出。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大工程师[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Metropolitain[COLOR_REVERT] increases commerce output for each building in its city. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: 摩索拉斯陵墓
TEXT.Chinese: 摩索拉斯陵墓
TEXT.French: The Great Mausoleum

TEXT.English: [TAB]Maussollos died in 349 BC. King of Caria during his lifetime, Maussollos wished to leave a reminder of himself for future generations in the form of a great tomb. In addition to hiring hundreds of laborers, Maussollos commissioned five of the finest artisans in the Hellenic world to design the hundreds of statues that were to line the peripheries of his white marble resting place.[PARAGRAPH:1]Over 130 feet tall upon completion, the Mausoleum of Maussollos stood by the harbor of Halicarnassus until 1522, when the Knights Hospitaller tore it down in order to use the stones to build defenses against the approaching Turks.
TEXT.French: The Great Mausoleum

TEXT.English: 伦敦阿比米尔斯排水站
TEXT.Chinese: 伦敦阿比米尔斯排水站
TEXT.French: Abbey Mills

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]伦敦阿比米尔斯排水站[COLOR_REVERT]在每个城市创建一个免费的[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]下水道[COLOR_REVERT]。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大工程师[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]伦敦阿比米尔斯排水站[COLOR_REVERT]在每个城市创建一个免费的[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]下水道[COLOR_REVERT]。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大工程师[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Abbey Mills[COLOR_REVERT] creates a free [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Sewer[COLOR_REVERT] in every city. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: 门罗公园
TEXT.Chinese: 门罗公园
TEXT.French: Menlo Park

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]门罗公园[COLOR_REVERT]增加有电力供应的城市的商业产出。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大科学家[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]门罗公园[COLOR_REVERT]增加有电力供应的城市的商业产出。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大科学家[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。
TEXT.French: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Menlo Park[COLOR_REVERT] increases commerce output in cities with access to power. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Scientist[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: 诺贝尔奖
TEXT.Chinese: 诺贝尔奖
TEXT.French: Nobel Prize

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]为每一个出生在快乐或友好文明中的伟人提供额外的[ICON_GREATPEOPLE]
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]为每一个出生在快乐或友好文明中的伟人提供额外的[ICON_GREATPEOPLE]
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Extra [ICON_GREATPEOPLE] for every Great Person born in a pleased or friendly Civilization

TEXT.English: 诺贝尔奖授予了%s3中的%s1伟人%s2，增加了%d4[偶像伟人]
TEXT.Chinese: 诺贝尔奖授予了%s3中的%s1伟人%s2，增加了%d4[偶像伟人]
TEXT.French: A nobel prize has been awarded to the %s1 Great Person %s2 in %s3, adding %d4 [ICON_GREATPEOPLE]

TEXT.English: 当一个伟人出生在一个有着愉快或友好关系的文明中时，诺贝尔奖[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]为伟人提供了分数。它还增加了这个城市产生一位大政治家的机会。
TEXT.Chinese: 当一个伟人出生在一个有着愉快或友好关系的文明中时，诺贝尔奖[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]为伟人提供了分数。它还增加了这个城市产生一位大政治家的机会。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Nobel Prize[COLOR_REVERT] provides Great People Points when a Great Person is born in a civilization with pleased or friendly relations. It also increases its city's chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Statesman[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: 扎莫希奇老犹太会堂
TEXT.Chinese: 扎莫希奇老犹太会堂
TEXT.French: Old Synagogue

TEXT.English: 犹太宗教建筑中的[ICON_BULLET]+2[ICON_GOLD]
TEXT.Chinese: 犹太宗教建筑中的[ICON_BULLET]+2[ICON_GOLD]
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]+2[ICON_GOLD] from Jewish religious buildings

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]扎莫希奇老犹太会堂[COLOR_REVERT]为你城市中的所有犹太建筑增加了额外的黄金。它还增加了城市生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大商人[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]扎莫希奇老犹太会堂[COLOR_REVERT]为你城市中的所有犹太建筑增加了额外的黄金。它还增加了城市生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大商人[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Old Synagogue[COLOR_REVERT] adds additional gold to all Jewish buildings in your cities. It also increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Merchant[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: 拉哈斯大教堂
TEXT.Chinese: 拉哈斯大教堂
TEXT.French: Las Lajas Sanctuary

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]+所有城市10%单位治愈率
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]+所有城市10%单位治愈率
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]+10% unit heal rate in all cities

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]拉斯拉哈斯圣殿[COLOR_REVERT]增加所有城市的单位治疗效果。它还增加了城市生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大先知[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]拉斯拉哈斯圣殿[COLOR_REVERT]增加所有城市的单位治疗效果。它还增加了城市生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大先知[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。
TEXT.French: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Las Lajas Sanctuary[COLOR_REVERT] increases unit heal reate in all cities. It also increases its city's chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: 水晶大教堂
TEXT.Chinese: 水晶大教堂
TEXT.French: Crystal Cathedral

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]水晶大教堂[COLOR_REVERT]通过使用金色滑块增加城市的幸福输出，并为所有[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]牧师[COLOR_REVERT]专家添加额外的商业。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大先知[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]水晶大教堂[COLOR_REVERT]通过使用金色滑块增加城市的幸福输出，并为所有[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]牧师[COLOR_REVERT]专家添加额外的商业。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大先知[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Crystal Cathedral[COLOR_REVERT] increases its city's happiness output from using the gold slider and adds additional commerce to all of your [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Priest[COLOR_REVERT] specialists. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: 东京晴空塔
TEXT.Chinese: 东京晴空塔
TEXT.French: Skytree

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]东京晴空塔[COLOR_REVERT]为您所有的[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]科学家[COLOR_REVERT]和食物添加了额外的产品给您所有的[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]工程师[COLOR_REVERT]专家。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大工程师[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]东京晴空塔[COLOR_REVERT]为您所有的[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]科学家[COLOR_REVERT]和食物添加了额外的产品给您所有的[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]工程师[COLOR_REVERT]专家。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大工程师[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Skytree[COLOR_REVERT] adds additional production to all of your [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Scientist[COLOR_REVERT] and food to all your [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Engineer[COLOR_REVERT] specialists. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: 查普尔特佩克城堡
TEXT.Chinese: 查普尔特佩克城堡
TEXT.French: Chapultepec Castle

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]+每个文化级别1个单位经验
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]+每个文化级别1个单位经验
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]+1 unit experience per culture level

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]查普尔特佩克城堡[COLOR_REVERT]为在其城市中建造的单位提供每种文化级别1次经验。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大政治家[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]查普尔特佩克城堡[COLOR_REVERT]为在其城市中建造的单位提供每种文化级别1次经验。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大政治家[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。
TEXT.French: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Chapultepec Castle[COLOR_REVERT] grants 1 experience per culture level to units built in its city. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Statesman[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: 芳堤娜城堡
TEXT.Chinese: 芳堤娜城堡
TEXT.French: Chateau Frontenac

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]+50%铁路建设速度
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]+50%铁路建设速度
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]+50% building speed for Railroads

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]芳堤娜城堡[COLOR_REVERT]在每个城市创建一个免费的[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]火车站[COLOR_REVERT]，并提高铁路的建设速度。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]芳堤娜城堡[COLOR_REVERT]在每个城市创建一个免费的[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]火车站[COLOR_REVERT]，并提高铁路的建设速度。它还增加了生成[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]的机会。
TEXT.French: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Chateau Frontenac[COLOR_REVERT] creates a free [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Railway Station[COLOR_REVERT] in every city and increases the building speed for railroads. It also increases the chance of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]牛津大学[COLOR_REVERT]可大大提升所在城市的科研能力。并允许你供养三位科学家，还可提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大科学家[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]牛津大学[COLOR_REVERT]可大大提升所在城市的科研能力。并允许你供养三位科学家，还可提升城市产生[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大科学家[COLOR_REVERT]的几率。
TEXT.French: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Oxford University[COLOR_REVERT] adds additional science to all of your specialists. It also increases its city's odds of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Scientist[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: 建成[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]耶稣巨像[COLOR_REVERT]允许每回合改变一次[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]官方信仰[COLOR_REVERT]或[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]内政法令[COLOR_REVERT]，并不会导致无政府状态，还可提升[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大工程师[COLOR_REVERT]的出现几率。
TEXT.Chinese: 建成[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]耶稣巨像[COLOR_REVERT]允许每回合改变一次[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]官方信仰[COLOR_REVERT]或[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]内政法令[COLOR_REVERT]，并不会导致无政府状态，还可提升[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大工程师[COLOR_REVERT]的出现几率。
TEXT.French: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Cristo Redentor[COLOR_REVERT] allows its builder to switch [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Religions[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Civics[COLOR_REVERT] instantly once per turn, with no anarchy. It also increases the chances of a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT] appearing.

TEXT.English: 只能在赤道附近建造
TEXT.Chinese: 只能在赤道附近建造
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]+1[ICON_COMMERCE] for every [LINK=literal]Satellite[\LINK] constructed[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+5[ICON_COMMERCE] for every space project completed
